title: How do I View all Investigations from the Patient Dashboard?
body:
Follow these steps to view all Investigations from the Patient Dashboard:
Open the Patient Record
Click Dashboard to open the patient dashboard
Navigate to the Summary
Click View Investigations to open the full list of all Investigations.
How do I View all Immunisations from the Patient Dashboard?
If you need further assistance please contact support on 1300 103 903 or email atsupport@medirecords.com
